99

Asking About Hispanic or

Latino Origin (Ethnicity)

Choose one that you feel comfortable with and drag it over to the registrar to see the patient’s answer.

When asking your patients to choose their Hispanic or Latino origin (ethnicity), you have several acceptable question types, such as:

When asking your patients to choose their Hispanic or Latino origin (ethnicity), you have several acceptable question types, such as:

Do you consider yourself Hispanic or Latino?

Are you of Hispanic or Latino origin?

Do you identify as Hispanic or Latino?     

Yes I do.

Choosing any one of these questions is fine. Remember, this is all about asking the right REAL questions, consistently, accurately, completely and compassionately.
